00044 class EmsCreator {
00045     public:
00046         struct SpaceInfo {
00048             UINT8   m_pdu_count;
00050             UINT8   m_free_chars;
00051         };
00052         
00053         EmsCreator();
00054         ~EmsCreator();  // not virtual!
00055         
00056         SpaceInfo GetSpaceInfo(const EditorDocument& document, const SmsContext* context);
00057         BOOLEAN CreateMessages(const EditorDocument& document, const SmsContext* context, SmsFactory* factory);
00058         
00059 
00060     private:
00061         BOOLEAN ProcessDocument(const EditorDocument& document);
00062         BOOLEAN TraverseDocument(const EditorDocument& document);
00063         BOOLEAN TraverseDocument(const CompoundItem& parent);
00064         BOOLEAN AnalyseItem(const AbstractEditorItem& item);
00065         BOOLEAN ProcessImage(const Image* image);
00066         BOOLEAN ProcessSound(const Sound* sound);
00067         BOOLEAN ProcessFormattedText(const RichTextCompoundItem& item);
00068         BOOLEAN ProcessText(const WString& str, InformationElement* ie = 0);
00069         /* Calculates the remaining space if inserting of the give <em>InformationElement</em>
00070             is possible. In calc-mode (m_factory == 0) only the identifier of the given <em>ie</em>
00071             is needed and the additional size <em>add_size</em> is also included. If the
00072             inserting into the current PDU is not possible, <em>FALSE</em> is returned and
00073             no counter values are changed. */
00074         BOOLEAN ProcessAtomicIe(InformationElement& ie, UINT8 add_size);
00075         /* Calculates the remaining space if inserting of the give <em>InformationElement</em>
00076             and text is possible. <em>ie</em> may be <em>0</em> to indicate plain text.
00077             Retruns the number of processed characters or a value less than 0 if the
00078             text could not be inserted. */
00079         INT ProcessTextIe(InformationElement* ie, const WString& text, INT text_size);
00080         
00081 
00082         void ResetCounters();
00083         UINT8 CalcFreeChars() const;
00084         BOOLEAN TerminateSegment();
00085 
00086         UINT8 GetMaxPduSize() const { return SmsSubmit::c_max_guaranteed_user_data_size;}
00087         UINT8 CalcHeaderSize(UINT8 add_size) const { return m_header_size + add_size + (m_header_size == 0 && add_size > 0 ? 1 : 0); }
00088 
00089         static BOOLEAN          m_concatinated;
00090         static UINT8            m_header_size;  // size of user data header, always in bytes
00091         static UINT8            m_text_length;  // size of text, alphabet dependend (septets, octets, words)
00092         static UINT8            m_text_pos;     // size of text, number of characters
00093         static UINT8            m_concatinated_buffer[];
00094         static UINT8            m_buffer[];
00095         InformationElement::TextAlignment m_alignment;
00096         static WString          m_pdu_text;     // Text of a single pdu
00097         SmsFactory*             m_factory;
00098         const SmsContext*       m_context;
00099         SpaceInfo               m_space;
00100         InformationElement      m_concatinated_ie;
00101 };
